name: Lithic Blade
desc: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.
skill_desc: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 7%/8%/9%/10%/11% ATK increase and 3%/4%/5%/6%/7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
